summary.para: Specifies the activation parameters for an .
Format descriptor for spatial audio objects associated with the stream. All objects must have the same format and must be of type WAVEFORMATEX or WAVEFORMATEXTENSIBLE.
A bitwise combination of AudioObjectType values indicating the set of static spatial audio channels that will be allowed by the activated stream.
The minimum number of concurrent dynamic objects. If this number of dynamic audio objects can't be activated simultaneously, no dynamic audio objects will be activated.
The maximum number of concurrent dynamic objects that can be activated with .
The category of the audio stream and its spatial audio objects.
The event that will signal the client to provide more audio data. This handle will be duplicated internally before it is used.

The object that provides notifications for spatial audio clients to respond to changes in the state of an . This object is used to notify clients that the number of dynamic spatial audio objects that can be activated concurrently is about to change.
Optional default value for the decay model used for objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.
Optional default value for the spatial audio directivity model used for objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.
Optional default value for the type of environment that is simulated when audio is processed for objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.
Optional default value for the orientation of objects associated with the stream. nullptr if unused.
